name: Desperados 2: Cooperâ€™s Revenge
description: John Cooper's brother, Marshal Ross Cooper, was brutally murdered by a criminal known as "Angel Face". Swearing revenge, John sets out to uncover the killer's identity and avenge his brother's death. To reach Angel Face, John will need to reassemble his gang of bounty hunters, including old friends like Doc McCoy and Kate O'Hara, as well as recruit new members into the group.
